summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby regarding a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team. The emails discuss scheduling a meeting for the week of October 8, 2013, to manage Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and is communicating with Lesley Groff.

persons.name: Paul
persons.context: Paul is mentioned as part of the Deutsche Bank team that will be meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Harry
persons.context: Harry informed Amanda Kirby that Jeffrey Epstein wanted to set up a meeting with the Deutsche Bank team.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual for whom the meeting is being scheduled with the Deutsche Bank team.

connections.description: Lesley Groff and Amanda Kirby are working together to coordinate a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Amanda Kirby is involved in managing the accounts of Jeffrey Epstein at Deutsche Bank.
Lesley Groff is coordinating with Paul regarding the meeting with Jeffrey Epstein.
Harry provided information to Amanda Kirby about Jeffrey Epstein's request for a meeting.

events.title: Meeting with Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for the week of October 8, 2013, to discuss the management of Jeffrey Epstein's accounts.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, US 10154-0004
keyFacts: Lesley Groff is coordinating a meeting with Jeffrey Epstein and the Deutsche Bank team.
Amanda Kirby is involved in scheduling the meeting and managing Epstein's accounts.
The meeting is proposed for October 7 or 8, 2013.
Harry informed Amanda Kirby about Epstein's request for the meeting.
The correspondence is classified as public.
